course.title: MAT 5193 Linear Models (3 units)
course.desc: Theory of non-full-rank linear models: estimable functions, best linear unbiased estimators, hypothesis testing, confidence regions; multi-way classification; analysis of covariance; variance component models: maximum likelihood estimation, MINQUE, ANOVA methods. Miscellaneous topics. This course is equivalent to STAT 5503 at Carleton University.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: MAT 4175 (MATH 4500) or MAT 5190 (STAT 5600).
